methods.description: Sets the image of the calling sprite object based on a URL
Sets the image of the calling sprite object to a default image based on the name provided
Immediately moves the calling sprite to the location specified on the grid
methods.note: Specifying a destination outside the acceptable range of 0-9 will result in program termination

methods.description: Moves the calling sprite in the direction specified by the number of spaces specified at the speed specified
methods.note: Acceptable directions are left, right, up, down

methods.description: Moves the calling sprite to the x and y coordinates specified at the speed specified
methods.note: Specifying a destination outside the acceptable range of 0-9 will result in program termination

methods.description: Sets the key that will move the calling sprite upwards
methods.note: Any key on the keyboard is allowed

methods.description: Sets the key that will move the calling sprite downwards
methods.note: Any key on the keyboard is allowed

methods.description: Sets the key that will move the calling sprite left
methods.note: Any key on the keyboard is allowed

methods.description: Sets the key that will move the calling sprite right
methods.note: Any key on the keyboard is allowed
